title: Effective Web-Based Learning Design for Government Online Education and Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and understanding of general educational curricula
context.additional_context: Emphasizes practical strategies to overcome low motivation and participation barriers in online learning platforms. Requires blended instructional design combining theory and practice.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the core elements of web-based government education programs (goal setting, content organization, interaction design).
Learners can suggest three or more effective web-based activities (e.g., scenario-based learning, gamification) to increase learner engagement.
Learners can design an evaluation and feedback system for government online training programs to measure learning effectiveness.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
